itemDescription: Iranian-British journalist, translator, blogger and film maker

wikipedia_page.main:
Bahman Daroshafaei (Persian: بهمن دارالشفایی) is an Iranian-British journalist, translator, blogger and film maker. Daroshafaei is a former journalist of the BBC's Persian service.
Daroshafaei left BBC Persian at 2013 and returned to Iran. 
He had been working as a translator for Mahi Publishing Company and for an Iranian NGO.In February 2016, Daroshafaei was arrested in Tehran- Iran, he was taken from his home by judiciary officers.

response: * February 3 – Authorities arrest former BBC journalist and dual Iranian-British citizen Bahman Daroshafaei.
